meanings.definition: Making or becoming still or quiet.
meanings.sent1: The classroom was so stilling during the test.
meanings.sent2: The lake was stilling as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The stilling library was a peaceful place to read.
meanings.sent4: Her calming presence had a stilling effect on everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The soft music had a stilling effect on my mind, helping me relax.

meanings.definition: The act of making something still or quiet.
meanings.sent1: His stilling of the baby's cries was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The stilling of the wind brought a sense of peace to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the mysterious stilling of the audience.
meanings.sent4: The stilling of the waves calmed the anxious sailors.
meanings.sent5: The stilling of the city noises allowed for a moment of tranquility.
